content: dog bandanna crochet pattern by sara sara please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites we just updated this pattern with lots of new pictures and a brand new video you can find this pattern at this link http //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2011/02/crochet-pattern-for-dog-bandana-collar html skill easy materials hook - h / 5 00 mm yarn - any med 4 acrylic cotton or bland will work yarn needle stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet size fits a small dog - 8-12 inch neck 5-10 lb dog to adjust add or subtract 4 chs per inch 4 chs=1 inch please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
